title: Scrubber Parameters
description: Factors that control the behavior of a Java class that removes private parts of a data object before the object is shared

removeDate.description: When true, remove all date fields from output

deidentifyAuditUser.description: When true, remove users listed as creator or modifier of records and subrecords

excludedReferencePatterns.description: References to omit (pattern applies to document type)

deidentifiedReferencePatterns.description: References to replace (pattern applies to document type)

accessGroupsToInclude.description: names of access groups to that will NOT be removed
